message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $9,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is cutting it too close to my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8,250?
Bob, I'm motivated to sell, but I need a price that makes sense for me too.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $8,625? This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8,500? This is my final offer
